title: Low Priority Queue
body: So I was In a ranked match and my LOL crashed. It took me about 10 minutes to get back in the game, and I knew from there I would probably have a low priority queue. So I have been having to wait 20 minutes but how many times? I have waited in a low priority queue way more than 5 times, and I'm just wondering how long more will  have to wait to play a game of LOL?

replies.body: The timer as well as the amount of games requires to be played will continue to escalate with consistent interruptions.  More information on this can be found in our[ Leaverbuster FAQ.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ)  The client will inform you of how many games you have remaining, and I'd like to help you resolve whatever is causing you to leave.  Let me know if you're having any issues, and I'll see what I can do!
Every time you complete a game, LeaverBuster should let you know the remaining amount of games you need to play in Low Priority Queue to the top right corner of the client.
